alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:05PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS WITH TORRENTIAL DOWNPOURS ACROSS THE NORTHWOODS... Small clusters of showers and isolated thunderstorms will continue to develop across north-central Wisconsin through early evening. The showers and storms will be mainly north and west of a line from Merrill to Antigo to Iron Mountain, Michigan. Although brief wind gusts to around 30 mph are possible with the storms, the main impact of the storms will be very heavy downpours. When combined with a slow drift of the storms to the southwest at only about 5 mph, some locations could see 1 to 2 inches of rain in a short period of time. That may result in some ponding of water on area roadways. Boaters should remain off inland lakes while thunderstorms are in the area. Anyone driving across the area should be prepared to encounter very heavy rainfall and limited visibility. Do not attempt to drive your vehicle through standing water on flooded roadways.
